Title: Corrigendum: Economy of Effort or Maximum Rate of Information? Exploring Basic Principles of Articulatory Dynamics (Frontiers in Psychology, (2019), 10, 10.3389/fpsyg.2019.02469)
Abstract: Copyright © 2020 Xu and Prom-on.In the original article, there were two errors in Equation (5). The lower limit of the summation should be i = 0 rather than i = 1. The denominator in the fraction should be (k – i)! rather than (N – k)! A correction has been made to Equation (5). The corrected equation appears below. (Formula presented.) The authors apologize for this error and state that this does not change the scientific conclusions of the article in any way. The original article has been updated.
